spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. The 3BHK layout is perfectly preserved. Slight deductions for minor door swing orientation inconsistencies in the toilets and minor window scaling variations.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. Roof is removed, all rooms are present without hallucinations, and the model floats on a clean dark background without any text or UI elements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement captures the essence of the floor plan accurately, including the kitchen island, washing machine in utility, and dining set. Minor deduction for sofa configuration variation in the living area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality low-poly aesthetic with flat shading. The isometric orthographic camera angle is correct. Slight deduction for minor ambient occlusion shadows that lean slightly towards realistic lighting rather than purely flat shading.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing orientation mismatch in the master toilet and powder room compared to the 2D plan.
The living room sofa arrangement (L-shape vs individual chairs) is a slight reinterpretation of the provided furniture layout.
